name: Virtual Husler
description: Manage your money(not real money) in this fun idle game. Trade stocks, mine crypto , own property or waste money at the slot machine the choice is yours. Your goal as the husler is to make as much money as the game will allow. The game does not save or have any offline progreesion you must keep the game open to earn. Escape the matrix and stay on the grind. Good luck. Side note the game is free but i would not mind a buck thanks.
